short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KOSTA enter/exit timer extension made by HeeJoo

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It is a simple check-in and check-out timer.
You can enter two times that you want so that the alarm pops up at that time.
The user does not forget what to do through the alarm.
